video.title: BoJack Horseman
video.synopsis: Meet the most beloved sitcom horse of the '90s, 20 years later. He’s a curmudgeon with a heart of...not quite gold...but something like gold. Copper?

episodes.synopsis: To help with the memoir he hopes will put him back in the spotlight, BoJack hires a ghostwriter.
episodes.title: BoJack Horseman: The BoJack Horseman Story, Chapter One

episodes.synopsis: BoJack finds himself the subject of national media attention after he calls the troops "jerks."
episodes.title: BoJack Hates the Troops

episodes.synopsis: BoJack reconnects with a friend from his past who moves into his house and creates pandemonium.
episodes.title: Prickly-Muffin

episodes.synopsis: BoJack decides to mentor Todd; Diane's ex-boyfriend writes an article about Mr. Peanutbutter.
episodes.title: Zoës and Zeldas

episodes.synopsis: A business trip for BoJack and Diane takes a detour; Todd runs a scam that gets him in trouble.
episodes.title: Live Fast, Diane Nguyen

episodes.synopsis: BoJack is jealous of Diane's relationship with Mr. Peanutbutter; Todd's in a new environment.
episodes.title: Our A-Story Is a 'D' Story

episodes.synopsis: BoJack sabotages himself with an epic bender; Princess Carolyn's agency merges with another.
episodes.title: Say Anything

episodes.synopsis: When he learns that his old friend from "Horsin' Around" is dying, BoJack tries to mend fences.
episodes.title: The Telescope

episodes.synopsis: A lovestruck BoJack tries to sabotage a wedding; Todd accepts a surprising new professional role.
episodes.title: Horse Majeure

episodes.synopsis: BoJack shoots a movie at Mr. Peanutbutter’s house; Diane finishes her book.
episodes.title: One Trick Pony

episodes.synopsis: BoJack embarks on a project in his typically gonzo style, leading to a drug-fueled revelation.
episodes.title: Downer Ending

episodes.synopsis: Months after his memoir is released, BoJack's being considered for a role that's a lifelong dream.
episodes.title: Later

episodes.synopsis: BoJack believes an upbeat attitude will change his life, but that attitude doesn't mesh well with his new acting job.
episodes.title: Brand New Couch

episodes.synopsis: BoJack is drawn to the one female in town who has no idea who he is (because she was in a coma). Todd opens a theme park.
episodes.title: Yesterdayland

episodes.synopsis: A funeral turns into a treasure hunt for the "Horsin' Around" cast, and a potential schmooze-fest for Princess Caroline and Mr. Peanutbutter.
episodes.title: Still Broken

episodes.synopsis: Princess Caroline, BoJack, Diane and Mr. Peanutbutter learn some important lessons about love in the wake of a surprise birthday party.
episodes.title: After the Party

episodes.synopsis: BoJack really wants his director Kelsey to like him. Todd, Diane and Kelsey's daughter help a chicken who's on the lam from the police.
episodes.title: Chickens

episodes.synopsis: Princess Caroline sees an opportunity when Mr. Peanutbutter's agent dies. BoJack flips when he says the "L" word out loud to Wanda.
episodes.title: Higher Love

episodes.synopsis: Diane goes off script during BoJack's book tour, jeopardizing Mr. Peanutbutter's new show. Todd gets involved in international affairs.
episodes.title: Hank After Dark

episodes.synopsis: BoJack is one of the celebrity guest stars on the first episode of Mr. Peanutbutter's game show, but the game doesn't go as expected.
episodes.title: Let's Find Out

episodes.synopsis: BoJack cooks up a scheme with Kelsey, Todd, Princess Carolyn and Mr. Peanutbutter to steal a crucial shot for the Secretariat film.
episodes.title: The Shot

episodes.synopsis: Todd gets sucked into the cult of improv comedy. Wanda thinks Diane is a bad influence on BoJack when he has to deal with a career crisis.
episodes.title: Yes And

episodes.synopsis: BoJack goes on a road trip to visit an old friend, and gets a taste of existence outside the Hollywoo bubble.
episodes.title: Escape from L.A.

episodes.synopsis: The important things in life become clear to BoJack when Todd moves out to join the improv comedy group on their special cruise ship.
episodes.title: Out to Sea
